Hi I have a quick question.

So recently, i have left the server, overall, Mine craft. However, I feel that in time, like when summer time comes around, I will be returning to Mine craft. Here is where my question will be implemented; When I do return, do I make a return post? Like just to say that I'm back? Or should I just return to game play without pre-notice? 

 Best regards,

 Sombrero_

If needed, lock.. 

<3

title: Returning policy?

replies.body:
We discourage leaving and return threads. If you do, it'll most likely be locked.
Users will recognise that you have returned, once you become active on the forums again!

replies.body: IIRC, permanent leaving threads are still illegal. Statistically speaking, I guarantee majority of users who publicly announce that they will not return to Avicus again, end up making a reappearance two weeks later (E.G. due to seasonal factors). Therefore it adjusts the supposedly permanent leaving thread, to a temporary one.

replies.body:
"If they announce that they were planning to leave, then make a reappearance within a short amount of time, that would make it a fake leaving thread, which would lead to it being locked, wouldn't it?"

This would usually lead to confusion (whether or not it was deemed permanent in the first place (edits could have been made)) and accusations of bias and/or inconsistency.

"Also, weren't some players banned for having a fake leaving thread?"

Yes that's correct, but the community disliked that. Therefore I believe we stopped punishing for it.
